Rule.Desc: The starting rule for the srcML grammar. The XML generated by srcML has two forms depending on input: 1) an archive (multiple files) and 2) compilation unit (a single file).
Any of the C preprocessor directives, any specially marked up text, or a comment. Any of the child rules contained within this rule occur almost anywhere within a compilation unit.

TagRule.name: archiveUnit
TagRule.title: archive unit
TagRule.Desc: An archive is a collection of compilation units.

TagRule.name: compilationUnit
TagRule.title: compilation unit
TagRule.Desc: A Compilation unit is a single file that was processed by srcML.

AttrRule.name: dirAttr
AttrRule.Desc: The directory attribute for a unit.

AttrRule.name: languageAttr
AttrRule.Desc: The language used by srcML to create the current unit.

AttrRule.name: filenameAttr
AttrRule.Desc: The file that was used to create the current unit.

AttrRule.name: optionsAttr
AttrRule.Desc: What options were used to build this document.

TagRule.name: macroList
TagRule.title: macro list
TagRule.Desc: A user defined macro definition provided to the srcML client.

AttrRule.name: macroTokenAttr
AttrRule.Desc: The element QName to mark as a macro.

TagRule.name: comment
TagRule.Desc: A comment within the supported programming languages.

AttrRule.name: commentTypeAttr
AttrRule.Desc: The type of comment, either a line comment or a block comment.

AttrRule.name: commentFormatAttr
AttrRule.Desc: Indicates a possible format of a comment.

TagRule.name: escape
TagRule.Desc: A special character, such as a form feed.

Rule.name: topLevelElements
Rule.Desc: All of the elements which can occur at the top level of a compilation unit. constructorDecl can only occur within body of a class.

Rule.name: anyCPPOrCommentOrText
Rule.title: any C preprocessor, comment or text
Rule.Desc: A listing of all elements which can occur anywhere.

TagRule.name: cppLiteral
TagRule.Desc: A preprocessor literal can be a single or double quoted string literal.

TagRule.name: forControl
TagRule.Desc: This is for a traditional for loop's control.

TagRule.name: CFunction
TagRule.Desc: C function definition. The declaration statements following the parameter list are only used for K & R C.

TagRule.name: event
TagRule.Desc: The event keyword occurs as part of the type element as text.

AttrRule.name: enumTypeAttr
AttrRule.Desc: Used to indicate that an enum is an enum class.

TagRule.name: JavaSuper
TagRule.Desc:
There are two ways that the super element is used. 1) Within a class, interface or annotation definition. 2) Within an enum or an anonymous class.
In the first case super will contain some combination of at least extends and/or implements.
In the second case only a name appears within the super indicating the enum type or class.

AttrRule.name: sizeofTypeAttr
AttrRule.Desc: This represents when size of is being used to count the number of parameters within a parameter pack, instead of determining the size of a type.

AttrRule.name: typeTypeAttr
AttrRule.Desc: This attribute is only used during the declaration of multiple variables of the same type. The element with this attribute may be empty.
